channel.title: misc on FOIA
channel.description: Recent content in misc on FOIA

item.title: 23-00001-CHAI
item.description: I emailed Gary Gensler directly (chair@sec.gov) to ask for a timely response to 23-00095-FOIA. I received a generic response from the FOIA branch chief. I’ve sent previous emails to chair@sec.gov; this is the first one I have received a numbered response. Response

item.title: 23-00009-REMD
item.description: It has been quite a saga searching for information about a closed Commission meeting. Steps to get to this remend: Submit 22-00069-FOIA and get rejected (Oct 2021) Submit 22-03086-FOIA and get rejected (Sept 2022) Appeal 23-00004-APPS to get sent back to FOIA office (Oct 2022) Acknowledgement Letter Complex - Still Consulting Letter
